I'll help you clone the website for Cake Equity. I'll use the available source data to recreate the website as a React application. I'll follow the standard website cloning workflow:

1. First, I'll get the layout of the website:2. Now, I'll spawn workers to generate the components:3. Now I'll check for any build errors:Great! I've successfully cloned the Cake Equity website. Here's a summary of what I've done:

1. Analyzed the website structure (11 sections detected)
2. Automatically generated React components for each section
3. Created an initial App.jsx and CSS files
4. Verified no build errors exist

The cloned website includes:
- 11 individual section components
- Global CSS from the original site
- Basic React application structure

Would you like me to make any specific modifications or improvements to the cloned website? I can help you with:
- Adjusting the layout
- Customizing styles
- Adding interactivity
- Making responsive design tweaks

Is there anything specific you'd like me to focus on?

import React from 'react'; export default function Section6Section() { return (

The "old way" of managing equity is costing you time and money

Many startups are locked into expensive equity platforms that hold their data hostage, paying skyrocketing fees while waiting weeks for basic support tasks like cap table uploads. Don't be stuck in multi-year contracts with platforms that excel at sales demos but disappear when you need help.

Old way

Hidden fees and unannounced price hikes that break your budget
Time-consuming demo-cycles and data migration
Support team that vanishes post-sale
Complicated legacy systems with steep learning curves
Static grants collecting dust

The Cake way

Upfront , startup-friendly pricing ‚Äî no hidden fees or surprise price hikes
Self-serve simplicity ‚Äî launch your free account within minutes
Real humans, not bots ‚Äî customer success team that cares
Easy, intuitive platform ‚Äî simple but powerful feature set that scales with you
Built to motivate and engage ‚Äî from grant to exit
Get started
); }

Everything you need from a cap table software, and more

Make informed financial decisions, from raise to exit

Accurately model scenarios and dilution to simulate funding rounds and exits
All documents you need for your next raise in one place ‚Äî SAFEs, convertibles
Add on valuations, 409A, HMRC, NTA as needed

Automate your equity plans so you can focus on growing your company

Run your equity programs on autopilot. Make it easy for your team to issue and manage equity grants to employees, advisors, and investors!

Offer NSO, RSU, RSA, depending on your requirements
Use our lawyer-approved equity agreement templates, or upload your own
Watch Demo

import React, { useState } from 'react'; export default function Section3Section() { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('cap-table'); const handleTabChange = (tab) => { setActiveTab(tab); }; return (
Features

Powerful tools to fast-track growth

{['cap-table', 'stock-options', 'capital-raise', 'contracts', 'employee-app', '409A-valuation'].map((tab) => ( handleTabChange(tab)} >
{tab === 'cap-table' ? 'Cap table' : tab === 'stock-options' ? 'Stock options' : tab === 'capital-raise' ? 'Capital raise' : tab === 'contracts' ? 'Contracts' : tab === 'employee-app' ? 'Employee app' : '409A'}
))}
{activeTab === 'cap-table' && (
{/* Cap Table Pane Content */}

Dynamic cap table management

Leverage the power of an updated, accurate, and clean cap table. Use Cake's advanced features to help you manage your growing number of shareholders, investors, and stock option holders.

"The cap table that we have in Cake is our source of truth. It's a tool that we use on a day-to-day basis."
ELLEN DINSMOOR
COO of Vow
Get started Learn more
)} {activeTab === 'stock-options' && (
{/* Stock Options Pane Content */}

Issue stock options

Offer equity grants to your team, whether stock options, share plans, RSU or RSA. Easily design your equity plans, configure vesting conditions, and stay compliant.

"Issuing stock options sounds bloody complex so it's good to be able to simplify it. Thanks for a genuinely great product that helps make what we do easier."
MICHAEL FOX
Founder & CEO of Fable Foods
Get started Learn more
)} {activeTab === 'capital-raise' && (
{/* Capital Raise Pane Content */}

Simulate capital raise and model scenarios

Model scenarios and see how new investment rounds will impact ownership. Use Cake's modeling and reporting tools, audit-proof valuations, and benchmark calculators to confidently plan for the future.

"Cake's feature set is exactly what we needed as a startup getting off the ground with an equity raise for the first time."
GAVIN BALLARD
‚ÄçFounder & CEO
Get started Learn more
)} {activeTab === 'contracts' && (
{/* Contracts Pane Content */}

Automated contract management

Offer equity grant to your team, anywhere in the world. Automate offer letters, set up vesting conditions, manage contract signing, all in one place!

"We're trying to issue options out to 150 people every year.. Trying to get people's signatures and just all of the admin around that ‚Äî who's signed, who hasn't signed, trying to keep track. With Cake, all that confusion is a thing of the past."
DARIUS COVENEY
‚ÄçCOO/CFO of Fluent Commerce
Get started Learn more
)} {activeTab === 'employee-app' && (
{/* Employee App Pane Content */}

Easy and transparent employee portfolio

Onboard fast, and communicate with your employees the value of their equity. They immediately get access to a team app and see the value of their equity in real time.

"I just found it so easy to just log in, click a couple of buttons, send the email to my employees, they sign it, and then it (stock options) is sorted. It's nice when I onboard someone, log in, send them a link and it's sorted very quickly."
AJAY PRAKASH
CEO of Entry level
Get started Learn more
)} {activeTab === '409A-valuation' && (
{/* 409A Valuation Pane Content */}

Fast, audit-proof 409A Valuations

Add-on 409A Valuation to your cap table plan and save hours of work! 409A valuations by expert startup appraisers, delivered within 3 business days.

Get started Learn more
)}
); }
